caption: Load Balancer
name: load_balancer
description: The Load Balancer object contains information related to the device that is distributing incoming traffic to specified destinations.

name.caption: Name
name.description: The name of the Load Balancer.

metrics.caption: Metrics
metrics.description: The general purpose metrics associated with the Load Balancer.

dst_endpoint.caption: Destination Endpoint
dst_endpoint.description: The destination that the Load Balancer is distibuting traffic to.

code.caption: Response Code
code.description: The numeric response code detailing the connection from the Load Balancer to the destination target.

status_detail.caption: Status Details
status_detail.description: The status details contains additional information about the event outcome.

error_message.caption: Error Message
error_message.description: The error message describing the Load Balancer distribution attempt.
